message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000.  It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. I've also found another seller, John, who is willing to sell it to me for $1,000,000. I would like to see if you can match or beat this offer.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to go down to $1,075,000. This is a very fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still believe the product should not exceed $1,050,000 based on its value to me. I am unable to increase my offer further. I will continue to consider other options available to me.
